text: Emilio Caprile (; 30 September 1928 â€“ 5 March 2020) was an Italian footballer. He was born in Genoa, Italy. He played as a forward. He was capable of playing both as a striker and as a left winger. He played for the Italian national team from 1948 to 1950 and for Juventus from 1948 to 1949 and again from 1951 to 1952. Caprile died in Genoa on 5 March 2020 at the age of 91.Addio Caprile, ex Juve e Nazionale.
